api-documentation.name: API Documentation Standards
api-documentation.description: Ensures API documentation includes all required sections and follows best practices

code-quality.name: Code Quality Standards
code-quality.description: Ensures generated code follows best practices and quality standards

content-structure.name: Content Structure Guidelines
content-structure.description: Ensures well-organized, readable content with clear structure

educational-clarity.name: Educational Content Clarity
educational-clarity.description: Ensures educational content is clear, well-structured, and pedagogically sound

framework-compliance.name: Framework Methodology Compliance
framework-compliance.description: Ensures responses follow the active framework methodology (CAGEERF, ReACT, 5W1H, SCAMPER). This is a framework-level gate that applies universally acr

plan-quality.name: Plan Quality Standards
plan-quality.description: Ensures implementation plans are complete, actionable, and risk-aware

pr-performance.name: PR Performance Check
pr-performance.description: Flags performance concerns without blocking. Warns but allows merge.

pr-security.name: PR Security Audit
pr-security.description: Blocks PR approval if security vulnerabilities are detected. Must pass before merge.

research-quality.name: Research Quality Guidelines
research-quality.description: Ensures thorough research with proper citations and credible sources

security-awareness.name: Security Best Practices
security-awareness.description: Ensures security-conscious development practices and prevents common vulnerabilities

technical-accuracy.name: Technical Accuracy Standards
technical-accuracy.description: Ensures technical correctness, fact-checking, and precision in technical content

test-coverage.name: Test Coverage Standards
test-coverage.description: Ensures code changes include appropriate test coverage
